SEARCH
Package research

Class Researcher

java.lang.Object
users.BaseDecorator
research.Researcher
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Comparable<Researcher>, User
public class Researcher extends BaseDecorator implements Comparable<Researcher>
Represents a researcher who conducts and publishes research projects and papers. A researcher is an advanced user with additional capabilities such as creating research projects, publishing research papers, and managing their research activities. The class implements the `Comparable` interface to allow comparison based on their H-index.
See Also:

    • getNumOfCitations

      public int getNumOfCitations()
      Calculates the total number of citations across all research papers authored by the researcher.
      Returns:
      the total number of citations

    • calculateHIndex

      public int calculateHIndex()
      Calculates the H-index of the researcher based on their research papers. The H-index is calculated as the maximum value of h such that the researcher has at least h papers with h or more citations each.
      Returns:
      the H-index of the researcher

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo(Researcher o)
      Compares this researcher with another based on their H-index in descending order.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<Researcher>
      Parameters:
      o - the other researcher to compare with
      Returns:
      a negative integer, zero, or a positive integer as this researcher has a greater, equal, or smaller H-index compared to the other researcher

      Returns a string representation of the researcher.

      Returns:
      a string containing the researcher's school, project participation, and H-index
